import React from 'react'; import {Navbar,Container, Nav} from 'react-bootstrap'; import {FaShoppingCart,FaUser} from 'react-icons/fa'; import logo from "../assets/logo.png"; import {LinkContainer} from 'react-router-bootstrap'; import {useSelector} from 'react-redux' const Header =()=>{ const {cartItems} = useSelector((state)=>state.cart); console.log(cartItems); return(
ProShop
Cart Sign In
) } export default Header;
